snippet: Just 18 days after Phil Mickelson’s name was engraved on the silver claret jug at Muirfield as the British Open champion, the first tee shot will be struck at Oak Hill for the P.G.A. Championship.
lead_paragraph: Just 18 days after Phil Mickelson’s name was engraved on the silver claret jug at Muirfield as the British Open champion, the first tee shot will be struck at Oak Hill for the P.G.A. Championship.

headline.main: Year’s Last Major Could Yield Triumphant Relief for Woods or McIlroy
headline.print_headline: For Woods or McIlroy, Last Major of the Year Could Bring Back Glory
